rows.label: qst103106_msg001
rows.name:
Thanks for investigating. It seems the content
changes with the weather. Please investigate
the murals in all weather conditions. (temp)

rows.label: qst103106_msg002
rows.name:
It seems the content changes with the
weather. Please investigate the murals
in all weather conditions. (temp)

rows.label: qst103106_msg0001
rows.name:
Well? Were you able to
decipher the murals?

rows.label: qst103106_msg0002
rows.name:
What?! The characters you
could read were different
between day and night?

rows.label: qst103106_msg0003
rows.name:
Hmm... Each seems meaningful, but
I don't understand the intent.

rows.label: qst103106_msg0004
rows.name:
Especially this part about
"becoming the stars of day"...

rows.label: qst103106_msg0005
rows.name: [ML:Feeling kind=Anger ]That's it!! Speaking of stars!! Ugh...

rows.label: qst103106_msg0006
rows.name: Forgive me. I got a bit carried away.

rows.label: qst103106_msg0007
rows.name:
The ancient Nopon did not settle
in one place, but lived on ships,
moving from place to place.

rows.label: qst103106_msg0008
rows.name:
They read the stars and
mastered an extremely accurate
method of navigation...

rows.label: qst103106_msg0009
rows.name:
In other words, the "stars of
day" might indicate a destination
of some kind... If so...

rows.label: qst103106_msg0010
rows.name:
Come to think of it... the
places where the murals were
found had names, did they not?

rows.label: qst103106_msg0011
rows.name:
"Ruins of Leadership,"
"Ruins of Resilience,"
and "Ruins of Knowledge."

rows.label: qst103106_msg0012
rows.name:
"Knowledge is resilient
leadership." This must
indicate the reading order!

rows.label: qst103106_msg0013
rows.name:
Hmm, wait a moment... I
believe at night it was...

rows.label: qst103106_msg0014
rows.name:
"Become the stars of day, knowledge
is resilient leadership, then you shall
be granted the hero's treasure."

rows.label: qst103106_msg0015
rows.name: And during the day...

rows.label: qst103106_msg0016
rows.name:
"The moisture of Farlaine,
the nurtured young Rohne,
sleeping in that embrace."

rows.label: qst103106_msg0017
rows.name:
The night message explains how to read
the day one... and the day one indicates
a location of something... I see.

rows.label: qst103106_msg0018
rows.name:
Forgive me, but I am not familiar
with the lands of Invidia.

rows.label: qst103106_msg0019
rows.name:
Could you go to the place
indicated by the daytime text?

rows.label: qst103106_msg0020
rows.name:
This is as far as I can get
with solving the riddle. I
leave the rest to you.

rows.label: qst103106_msg0101
rows.name:
"The moisture of Farlaine,
the nurtured young Rohne,
sleeping in that embrace."

rows.label: qst103106_msg0102
rows.name:
Please find the location this sentence
points to. I'm counting on you.
